website_summaries.verdict: Pretty as a picture and in a rainbow of colors, this lacy and feminine strapless bra is as functional as it is attractive.
pros: Looks great peeking out under a tank top or button-down shirt, so it can take the place of a camisole
Both large- and small-busted users find it provides the necessary support
Runs true to size, easy to put on and take off
cons: Price point runs a bit high for some consumers
May not work with low-cut outfits where bra shouldn't show

customer_reviews.title: Finally, a bandeau that stays put...
customer_reviews.text: I am 5’7”, 125 lbs and wear a 34B. I got the medium bandeau. It is the first one that has ever fit me. Others have had no support and my darling chest just ‘hung’. At first this bandeau seemed tight, but it needs to be snug in order to give you any support. I really like this bra. It will give me options, that I can occasionally wear something strapless—or spaghetti-strapped tops. It is made exceptionally well. I am almost 60 yrs old.
customer_reviews.author: P&C

customer_reviews.title: It's ok, I'm keeping it, but it's not truly worth the higher price.
customer_reviews.text: I'm pretty sure this is going to work ok for the backless shirt I've been wanting to wear for months. My only complaints are that the edges aren't very soft, I hope that'll change in the wash. The plastic lining on the top seams it's really thin and I'm not sure it'll actually do its job well. And, it seems like the price for what you get should have been a lot lower, like maybe $25. For the actual price, I expected a lot more. I guess, for a Victoria's Secret price, I expected Victoria's Secret quality and it's not even close. :-(
customer_reviews.author: TMooreKajiwara

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a bandeau bra that didn't cut into my skin and show a "shelf", plus one that was pretty enough to have parts seen under certain outfits. This fit the bill perfectly. There's enough support for me, no hooks, really pretty lace and a smooth upper seam. I wear a 34 C or D and a medium fit well. It's a little more pricey than I wanted but I like it enough to order more colors.
customer_reviews.author: Kath

customer_reviews.title: Well made & very pretty for the right price
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe what a deal I got on this bandeau bra!! I got the purple color in a M (I wear a 36B) & it fit perfectly. Just snug enough to stay up (& has the non-slip lining) but not too tight. And I got it for $5.34 somehow! Only problem is, now I want the matching hipster panties & they are $34!! What?! Anyway, so happy I snagged this deal, this will be so cute under loose fitting summer tanks :)
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: Won't slide down!
customer_reviews.text: If you've been hunting for the perfect lace bandeau, you've found it. I first bought one of these through Groupon for a ridiculously cheap price and have since regretted not buying more while they were available there. Despite how much more it was here on Amazon, I splurged on a second color and don't regret it. Great quality, beautiful and rich colors, excellent support and extra coverage, comfortable, and best of all it won't slide down!!!
customer_reviews.author: Audrey

customer_reviews.title: very wide and uncomfortalbe
customer_reviews.text: it is to thick in the width which means it rolls at the top its not flattering or comfortable I expected better of this company for their price point, cheap material poor construction, poor design
customer_reviews.author: anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Great coverage
customer_reviews.text: While this bandeau does cut into my boobs a bit, it's still pretty comfortable. I wear it under all of my see through blouses this summer, which is money well spent for me. It does not irritate my skin, and it does not make me feel uncomfortable. I do have to line the inside with pads, so that my nips do not peak through, but overall this is a win!
customer_reviews.author: B. LeTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: I paid more money hoping I would get a better quality strapless bandeau
customer_reviews.text: I paid more money hoping I would get a better quality strapless bandeau. The sticky liner allows for the ability for the bra to be held up well, the overall quality isn't great. I've bought bras just like this for a third of the price. The bra itself is quite narrow as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Made mom's day
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my mom after she had a pace-maker put in and is unable to wear her regular bra for a couple of months. She is in her 70s and doesn't like change, but she loved this bra! She said its beautiful, soft and very comfortable. She also said it made her feel very secure when going out in public and asked me to order her a 2nd one. I am very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: carol treiger

customer_reviews.title: Solid bandeau, nice lace
customer_reviews.text: Bought to wear under low cut top- perfect, wore on top of another bra. Also wore as a bra by itself- did fine. Had some minor sagging throughout the day as one might expect with a bandeau- hiked it up maybe 4 times. Good shape, comfortable, lace is soft and pretty. I got size L and am sz 10, 34DD(D, depending on brand)/36C. Agree with others that I wouldn't pay full price, wait for sale prices.
customer_reviews.author: JK

customer_reviews.title: Really cute item
customer_reviews.text: too bad I didn't receive it in time for what I needed it for. Very nice though.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: although very cute it is just a tidbit too big ...
customer_reviews.text: although very cute it is just a tidbit too big. I got a Size M since I wear a 32D in a regular bra. This was just too big around. I think I will get it in a Size S.
customer_reviews.author: ATLmom

customer_reviews.title: Great strapless camisole!
customer_reviews.text: I am a 36DD and a dress size 12. As a bra it was too small for be, but it was excellent as a strapless camisole for just covering cleavage. I got the bra in the blush/nude color. The lace was pretty and in my opinion it is a good quality product. I'm planning to buy more in different colors because summer is coming and I think they'll be great camisole solutions for it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This was my first bandeau. I am a 34/36 B/C and I ordered a M. I was most concerned with it giving me back boobs, but it fits nicely. Has boning on the sides but no padding up front. It didn't flatten me out at all. I will definitely buy more in different colors.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I received the correct item on try 2 and really love it! It fits great and has great stretch and staying power. I would like to get it in more colors.
customer_reviews.author: J. Hardin

customer_reviews.title: Nice colors but a little too thin in width.
customer_reviews.text: It's thinner then I expected. I wear Bandeus and have many, however these are thinner then my other ones. They aren't scratchy like some lace can be. In fact they are nice and soft. But if you are large breasted, these may not cover enough of you to feel comfortable. I purchased a larger size then I am and I am very glad I did.
customer_reviews.author: southern heritage

customer_reviews.title: Runs Small and Very Little Support
customer_reviews.text: This bra runs small and it does provide a bit of support. My confidence level isn't high regarding this staying in place for hours. Very pricy for what it is. My search for a good strapless bra continues.
customer_reviews.author: JustS

customer_reviews.title: Lovely and supportive for small frame
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous! I'm a 32b, small frame. Just really pretty, good support for me.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Best Bandeau Ever!
customer_reviews.text: I wear a 30 G and the medium fits perfectly... provides ample support and doesn't pinch my chest together.. it also doesn't move once it's on! Best bandeau I've ever owned!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda S Battistoni

customer_reviews.title: This is the most comfortable bra ever
customer_reviews.text: I am a 32DD. This is the most comfortable bra ever. Great for wearing in an Australian summer under strappy dresses and tops... I intend on getting more.....
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too expensive for what it is
customer_reviews.text: The bra is ok but just ok so I think it was way too expensive for what it is.
customer_reviews.author: Mitch Rapp

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love it. I am a 34c and I bought a medium and it fits very well. Nice solution for sheer tops or low cut outfits.
customer_reviews.author: Godswealth

customer_reviews.title: Good for strapless
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to wear with strapless casual dresses. It's comfy. Don't expect a lot of lift or support. Good for a small C cup or less.
customer_reviews.author: Randyl B.

customer_reviews.title: this is very pretty. I went by the measurements and reviews
customer_reviews.text: this is very pretty. I went by the measurements and reviews. I am pretty small but the small was too small for me. This will be super cute the the low and backless shirts i have.
customer_reviews.author: nikki

customer_reviews.title: Manufactured with inferior silicone.
customer_reviews.text: Bra seemed comfortable but when I removed it I discovered several large itchy welts along the silicone band lines that held the bra in place.
customer_reviews.author: Jvp

customer_reviews.title: Not comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Tough to find a good strapless bra, the inherent challenge. This is decent but it's a bit tight. Then again, since it's slip on, you wouldn't want it to be too loose either, but it's not as comfortable as I'd like.
customer_reviews.author: nbisf

customer_reviews.title: Cute and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This bra is very comfortable and works great under strap less dresses. It’s cute too!
customer_reviews.author: meghan

customer_reviews.title: Maybe it's made for you..
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful, well made, high quality bandeau. It just didn't suit me. It was too short & kinda squashy on me in the front, but fit nicely in the back. I tried a small, maybe a med would be better for my 34B size.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Nosenbk

customer_reviews.title: It's so pretty. Love the lace and it feels so soft and comfy!
customer_reviews.text: Love the fit and it will be perfect under my strapless wedding dress!
customer_reviews.author: karen moss wood

customer_reviews.title: Super cute & Comfy
customer_reviews.text: I was nervous about ordering a medium, but the size scale was exact to my measurements. It fits perfectly and is really cute. I can see myself wearing this as a bra all summer under my tank tops, but also under sheer tops for coverage. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Sash H

customer_reviews.title: Cosabella Women's Never Say Never
customer_reviews.text: Wow!!! Thank you so much.................I live in South Africa and have been searching all over for such "perfect" fit strapless bra's and must say after my first Order received and wearing my bra............................I immediately ordered more colors and love every one of them. I am sure the Modern woman would understand and appreciate the comfort of this bra.
customer_reviews.author: Johanna

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: A bit on the smaller side...doesn't offer any support. However, wears well underneath low cut/back out shirts or dresses.
customer_reviews.author: Ebony L.

customer_reviews.title: Love the way these fit
customer_reviews.text: Love the way these fit. I am a 36c, I ordered a medium, and the fit is great. I haven't had to pull them up at all..
customer_reviews.author: Daphne Koepp

customer_reviews.title: Lovely lace bandeau
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful color, sizing was spot on. Will look great for a peek of color on a backless dress, or to provide some coverage for lower cut shirts!
customer_reviews.author: ms.green.machine

customer_reviews.title: but disappointed it doesn't come with pads and this is not ...
customer_reviews.text: Fit as expected, but disappointed it doesn't come with pads and this is not stated on the website too.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki Wong

customer_reviews.title: comfortable and pretty
customer_reviews.text: I use this as a bra when wearing tank tops and tank dresses. It is comfortable, stays up no problem, and looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn McCollister

customer_reviews.title: i am small so this worked great and fits great
customer_reviews.text: one of my fav bandeaus. i am small so this worked great and fits great. very cute
customer_reviews.author: Misc.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it, snug and pretty. I will order a few more colors!
customer_reviews.author: CyndiAR

customer_reviews.title: Will definitely buy another one-very comfortable & not the typical bandeau bra-is more supportive
customer_reviews.text: I wear a 36- I bought a medium & it fits perfectly. Will definitely buy another one-very comfortable & not the typical bandeau bra-is more supportive.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Jones

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this. Perfect to wear under a loose piece and have some modesty.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: I have finally found a strapless bra that I am happy with. I have not been tempted to tug on or pull up these bras.
customer_reviews.author: ELISE PARTRIDGE

customer_reviews.title: I just love these Cosabella intimates
customer_reviews.text: I just love these Cosabella intimates. I use them for going out and around the house. I wanted a change from the usual rigid underwire bras that I have normally purchased, especially for the coming hot summer months. As a mom I want something quick, comfortable, and durable. My typical bra size is a 36 D and this set fit the bill. I purchased far more of these than I care to admit :)
customer_reviews.author: The Mom

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this strapless bra. Best one I have ever owned!
customer_reviews.author: Louise

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful badeau but if you have larger than a D cup order a extra large.
customer_reviews.author: Ann-Marie Gatlin

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love the feel of it. This is the first Bandeau I've owned. I will order more.
customer_reviews.author: Lise

customer_reviews.title: 36 A, small or medium fit
customer_reviews.text: Comfy and looks great under open back or dropped side shirts. Lace is soft, not itchy. I bought two styles in two sizes (straps and strapless, size small and medium) and miraculously, both fit! There is a slight bit of support, but not a ton. It's enough for a 36A like me. Has a little bit of padding. I like to slip in my old reusable cloth nursing pads to make sure no one sees my nipples throughout the day. :) Only tiny issue is that sometimes it doesn't lie flat around the bottom...it will sort of ride up a bit and create a fold. Very happy with it, regardless.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Osborn

customer_reviews.title: All of my dreams have come true.
customer_reviews.text: You guys. This bra is amazing. I've tried SO MANY different bras--from Target ones to going to a fancy place to get fitted. Either the cups don't fit right, they're too tight or too loose, or a straight jacket for your boobs. But this. This bra--it's comfortable, supportive enough, doesn't squish you flat, and stays in place. I'm in the A cup range and I don't know how this would work for larger-chested ladies, but henceforth this will be my main bra and I'm ordering several more.
customer_reviews.author: WhirledPeas

customer_reviews.title: I like it so well
customer_reviews.text: Am going to purchase additional colors, I like it so well.
customer_reviews.author: seattleaddie

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to any wardrobe
customer_reviews.text: After looking for something to go with a deep V dress I own (other than the oh-so-fashionable safety pin closure), I borrowed the Cosabella from a friend of mine. It looked stunning. Not only did it offer the right amount of coverage, it was stylish also-much more so than anything else I tried. I wear it over my bra, strapless or otherwise, and it's perfect for low V tops, see through tops, and more. You could probably wear it alone, but it might not be enough support for anyone who is a size C or larger. I currently only have the black, but will likely buy the skin-tone version as well.
customer_reviews.author: ALI

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Pretty color but not flattering for small chested women. Returning the item.
customer_reviews.author: Citydweller

customer_reviews.title: this is no help for a 38C
customer_reviews.text: This is very pretty...but it is no design breakthru...for a 38C, it doesn't provide enough support, even though it has side boneing. So, I returned it and am still waiting on my refund (which I was advised might take up to 6 weeks!).
customer_reviews.author: Gypsybaker

product_meta.title: Cosabella Women's Never Say Never Flirtie Bandeau
product_meta.description: Our newest bandeau bra available in a variety of colors for layering made from our classic never say never lace wide stretch lace band with a scalloped edge that lays softly flat on skin
feature_bullets: Wide stretch bandeau top in floral lace featuring scalloped edging
Scalloped edges lays flat on skin
Silicone lining along top and bottom
